QuestData.Title: Call of Air - Vipore's Fleet
QuestData.CompletionText: The elite Frostwolf units that guard the lines must be dealt with, soldier! I'm tasking you with thinning out that herd of savages. Return to me with medals from their lieutenants and legionnaires. When I feel that enough of the riff-raff has been dealt with, I'll deploy the air strike.
QuestData.RewardText: The flight will be ready soon. Continue your efforts!
